channel.title: Recourse Underground
channel.description: Recourse Underground is a podcast that promotes underground bands that don't have much prominence outside of the state that they live in. However, there are exceptions. For example, a band that goes on small tours will essentially gain prominence outside of the state they live in but it still won't give the band national (or even worldwide) recognition. Hopefully Recourse Underground will help bands get the recognition they deserve.
channel.copyright: Music Copyright Recourse Undergound. All songs used with permission from song writers. Podcast Copyright Danny Defcon
channel.itunes:subtitle: Recourse Underground
channel.itunes:summary: Recourse Underground is a podcast that promotes underground bands that don't have much prominence outside of the state that they live in. However, there are exceptions. For example, a band that goes on small tours will essentially gain prominence outside of the state they live in but it still won't give the band national (or even worldwide) recognition. Hopefully Recourse Underground will help bands get the recognition they deserve.
channel.itunes:author: Danny Defcon

item.title: Recourse Underground - Episode 1, Part 1
item.description: This is the very first episode. In this part of the episode I explain the premise of Recourse Underground and I play 2 bands: Ex-Dementia and Constance
item.itunes:author: Danny Defcon
item.itunes:keywords: Music, Underground music, Punk, Hardcore, Metal, DeathMetal, Grindcore, Rap, Crunk, Rockabilly, Recourse Records, Recourse Underground

item.title: Recourse Underground - Episode 1, Part 2
item.description: This is the very first episode. In this part of the episode I play the remaining 3 bands: The Mighty 18 Wheeler, Someday Soon and The 3 Kings
item.itunes:author: Danny Defcon
